name: Crashnauts
description: Crashnauts is a hard-hitting 2D Arena Shooter for 2-6 players local or online. Crush your enemies with your Crashpod or obliterate them with an array of satisfying weaponry. Simple at first but boasting deep mechanics, Crashnauts delivers fun for players of any skill level.
minimum_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 2200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2200 MB available space
